strategy: Apply a gradient boosting ensemble (e.g., XGBoost, LightGBM) with hyperparameter tuning via Bayesian optimization, focusing on learning rate, tree depth, and subsampling ratio. Introduce target encoding for categorical variables with high cardinality using smoothing to prevent overfitting. Use cross-validation with stratified splits to ensure stable performance estimation.
